paper_abstract: In this paper, we deal with a prey-predator model with diffusion in a degenerate environment. We obtain the necessary and sufficient condition for existence of positive steady-states, and observe an interesting spatial pattern when the prey-ability of the predator is weak. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Spatial patterns of a prey-predator model in a degenerate environment
